sections.content: We take client acquisition into our own hands by building our social media accounts to be an authority in our skill.

•


🥤 **Module 2 - Prospecting** 🥤 

"What is Prospecting?"

**Summary:**
- Prospecting is looking for potential people for your offer
- Search social media
- Get a clear idea of who you’re looking for and why your offer is good for them

**Action steps:**
- Understand what prospecting is

•




"Building Rapport"

**Summary:**
- Don’t waste their time - they don’t care about you
- Engage with a few of their posts and DM on the same day
- Be genuine - show your social proof and the ideas you have for them

**Action steps:**
- Engage with your prospect’s posts

•




"6 Figure DM Template"

**Summary:**
- Don’t copy/paste the exact template, otherwise, you won’t stand out
- Build up rapport with them before transitioning to the DMs aka follow and reply to some posts
- Examples of DMs: Specific compliment, a question that qualifies them for your service, or come out the gate with social proof and bullet points of what you want to do for them
- TEST different approaches, don’t just copy paste the same thing 1,000 times

**Action steps:**
- Start sending DMs
- If you get stuck, message me the professors in the ask the professors button

•




"The Perfect Script"

**Summary:**
- There is no perfect script
- Focus on explaining the benefits to them, not the features
- Grab their interest in the DM, then sell them on a call

**Action steps:**
- Create a DM that explains the benefits that you can give them

What is the perfect DM script?

a DMing prospects starting with "Hi, my name is \\|_.
b No, there is no perfect DM script. -
c Yes, I must follow the templates exactly.

What is the 6 Figure DM Template?

a Compliment, Question, Convo -
b Direct straight to the point
c Your life story followed by what you do

•


🥤 **Prospecting Continued...** 🥤 

"How to Find Search Terms for Prospecting (ChatGPT)"

**Summary:**
- When you’re prospecting, you can search with hashtags, keywords or phrases
- ChatGPT can give you examples of these for your niche

**Action steps:**
- Use ChatGPT to identify search terms for prospecting in your niche

•




"What are Products for Your Clients?"

**Summary:**
- Digital - eBook, video course, newsletter
- Physical - book, merchandise, supplements
- Service - coaching, businesses with a service

**Action steps:**
- Find prospects that are selling something
- You are in the business of helping clients make more money

•




"What to Do If Someone Has Their DMs Off"

**Summary:**
- Once you’ve identified them as a good lead, see if they have
- Accounts on other platforms
- A website with a contact form
- Find their email address (business only)
- If they don’t, move on because you only want prospects that have an actual audience

**Action steps:**
- Find other ways to contact your prospect

•




"Red Flags to Avoid"

**Summary:**
- Avoid accounts with large following but little engagement
- They start trying to lowball you
- They ghost you frequently
- They are highly emotional

**Action steps:**
- Avoid clients that show these red flags

•




"Why You Should Send DMs Daily"

**Summary:**
- Building up the habit will make it easier
- Most people only theorize about their good ideas but you won’t know until you actually take action
- You need to figure out the types of people who respond and what type of approach they respond best to

**Action steps:**
- Send DMs every single day

What is a red flag you should avoid?

A High Engagement
B Haggling -
C Neon Profile Picture

•


👀 **How to Find Clients** 👀 

"How to Find Clients on Twitter and Instagram"

**Summary:**
- Reach out to people with accounts of 10k to 100k followers in your niche/niches 
- Go through the people they’re following within your niche in the 10k-20k followers range
- Now you’ve turned 1 lead into dozens 
- Reach out to them in the DMs following the How to Write a DM course

**Action steps:**
- DM people the leads using the above
- Stick to The SIMPLE STEPS to know what to do (found in courses)

•




"How to Find Clients on Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn"

**Summary:**
- If you enjoy writing, Twitter might be best for you but if you’re more visual, Instagram might be better
- Put together a portfolio of your work on your chosen platform aka show proof of work (either for clients or for yourself)
- Search hashtags and keywords related to your niche

**Action steps:**
- Search for keywords in your niche on your chosen social media platform
- Keywords can be sentences and single words
- Use Chat GPT to find more if you feel stuck, prompt: Give me 50 keywords and topics around (INSERT NICHE) that customers are looking for.

•




"How to Find 100’s of Clients in 10 Minutes"

**Summary:**
- Avoid accounts with large following but little engagement
- They start trying to lowball you
- They ghost you frequently
- They are highly emotional

**Action steps:**
- Avoid clients that show these red flags

•




"How to Find Clients on Udemy"

**Summary:**
- Find a client that’s selling a course, find them on social media, and reach out to them
- Categories are niches, they have sub-niches - go specific into a sub-niche
- Click on the course creator’s profile to see their website or social media
- Copy their contact information into a Google sheet to keep track of your leads

**Action steps:**
- Go to a sub-niche on Udemy
- Copy 5-10 course creators’ contact details into a Google sheet
- Reach out to them on social media following the methods in the DM course (Complete more Lessons to Unlock)

How many followers must the accounts have ideally?

A10k-150k
B 5k-15k
C 10k-100k-

•


🥂 **Prospecting FAQ** 🥂 

"Can I DM a Lead Multiple Times?"

**Summary:**
- Yes, if you actually want to get what you want, you have to follow-up
- You’re not being annoying if you follow-up respectfully

**Action steps:**
- Follow-up if you don’t get a response

•




"Problem Prospecting"

**Summary:**
- Picking a niche gives you a framework to work in when prospecting
- Finding a sub-niche gives you terms to search for on social media
- Don’t overwhelm yourself by looking at everyone

**Action steps:**
- Pick a sub-niche to search for prospects in

Are you going to implement this course?

 A Of course

Ready to move onto the " How To Write A DM" course?

A IM READY
